## isStringOrHighlightedValue() function

Typeguard for data of type string or HighlightedValue

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isStringOrHighlightedValue(data: any): data is string | HighlightedValue;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  data | any | the data to validate |

<b>Returns:</b>

data is string \| HighlightedValue

whether the data is of type string or HighlightedValue
